name: Toad in the Hole (everydaylouie)
description:
D-Pad - Arrow Keys, A - Z, B - X, Start - Enter

A short and silly platformer, made to learn some of GB Studio 3's new features! 

(There may be various bugs. Nothing gamebreaking, I think.)

All art and music by me, Louie Zong. Soundtrack on bandcamp HERE

Thanks for playing!
